channel.title: Assassin's Creed pixel art [WIP]
channel.description:
Well, I wanted to make a pixel tutorial for this community but as I failed to save a few crucial steps in my pixel art, I wasn't able to show you every step. So, having failed in making a proper tutorial, I decided to just try and finish the pixel, I will need your help though. The best thing you can do know is give me some enviroment ideas, some nice concept.
Oh and before people start analyzing my interpretation of Altiar, this pixel is not intended to be an exact copy of Assasin's Creed, I left out certain details of his costume to make the pixel better.
Little sketch for anatomy: [IMG]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/3196/step1sq9.png[/img]
Outlining character (note: made some changes to pose but that's a step I forgot to capture): [IMG]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/5497/step2as8.png[/img]
Shading character (3-4tone)(Also skipped a few steps here): [IMG]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/9085/step3dv3.png[/img]
I'm not sampling my pieces here but this does not mean that you can edit/rip this art and claim it as your own, please pm me if you wish to do so.

item.title: Assassin's Creed pixel art [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:11, topic:167257”]It’s pretty cool. I’ll rate it once it’s finished.

[offtopic]
I had some cellotape stuck to my sock for the duration of this thread. Took me a while but in the end i managed to wrestle the thing off, stop it sticking to my fingers and dispose of it in the red and yellow bin to my right hand side.
[/offtopic][/quote]

Thats what u get for ripping ure presents open lol

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin's Creed pixel art [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @Hyjall Hyjall
item.description:
@Hyjall wrote:

So while you’re all here, why not just suggest me a background, or comment on my pixel art? I mean, you’re all in the topic now anyway. Just…throwing the idea in the group I guess, nothing special. Not trying to force it upon you or something, just placing some ideas. It’s no big deal really, I’m just stating the possibility, no really no, it’s ok.

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin's Creed pixel art [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:7, topic:167257”][quote author=Casey. link=topic=226645.msg1949856#msg1949856 date=1198468825]
The fucking tutorial is like 30 minutes lol
[/quote]

Is that a good thing or a bad thing?[/quote]
Well from a quick sweep on google can do it in less than 20, I suppose it’s a bad thing cause you want to get to playing the game.

Anyways, at the op.
Amazing work, I wish I could do that

item.title: Assassin's Creed pixel art [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:5, topic:167257”][quote author=brownsymcard link=topic=226645.msg1949824#msg1949824 date=1198467864]

Oh nice job with this. Good luck and I have recently got Assassins Creed

Assassins Creed is only good for renting. Each mission is the exact same, it gets boring after 4-5 hours.
[/quote]
There is no way you can get to the proper missions, in 4-5 hours. Yeah the start missions are boring and mostly the same but it gets better further on in the game.[/quote]
The fucking tutorial is like 30 minutes lol
